text: Johannes Arie "Hans" Breukhoven (31 October 1946 - 20 January 2017) was a Dutch businessman. He was the founder and president of Free Record Shop. He founded the retail store in 1971. Free Record Shop had hundreds of stores in the Netherlands, Belgium and Luxembourg. He was born in Rotterdam, South Holland. Breukhoven died from pancreatic cancer on 20 January 2017 in London, United Kingdom. He was 70. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Businesspeople from Rotterdam
title: Hans Breukhoven
